sources.title: A Tree Grows in Brooklyn (1945)
sources.description: In Brooklyn circa 1900, the Nolans manage to enjoy life on pennies despite great poverty and Papa's alcoholism. We come to know these people well through big and little troubles: Aunt Sissy's scandalous succession of "husbands"; the removal of the one tree visible from their tenement; and young Francie's desire to transfer to a better school...if irresponsible Papa can get his act together. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/a-tree-grows-in-brooklyn-1945/

metadata.Plot: In Brooklyn circa 1900, the Nolans manage to enjoy life on pennies despite great poverty and Papa's alcoholism. We come to know these people well through big and little troubles: Aunt Sissy's scandalous succession of "husbands"; the removal of the one tree visible from their tenement; and young Francie's desire to transfer to a better school...if irresponsible Papa can get his act together.
metadata.Writer: Tess Slesinger, Frank Davis, Betty Smith
metadata.Actors: Dorothy McGuire, Peggy Ann Garner, Joan Blondell
